name: Mage Hand
description:
A spectral, floating hand appears at a point you choose within range. The hand lasts for the duration or until you dismiss it as an action. The hand vanishes if it is ever more than 12m away from you or if you cast this spell again.
On your turn, you can use 3◉ to control the hand. You can use the hand to manipulate an object, open an unlocked door or container, stow or retrieve an item from an open container, or pour the contents out of a vial. You can move the hand up to 12m each time you use it.
The hand can't attack, activate magic items, or carry more than 5kg.
